issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

fields.description: {{google-cloud-cpp}} was a monolithic package in {{vcpkg}} until 2021-08-31.  To support GCS I need to add this package to the {{cpp/vcpkg.json}} file.  I also want to take advantage of features to keep the build times under control.
